subject: Website not loading
description: The homepage of the website shows a 500 internal server error since morning.

subject: Payment not processed
description: Customer tried to make a payment through credit card but the transaction failed.

subject: App crashing on launch
description: The Android version of the app crashes immediately after launching.

subject: Unable to reset password
description: User receives an error message when trying to reset their password via email link.

subject: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Several users have requested a dark mode option for better usability at night.
